676050.name: A Matter of Murder - Soundtrack
676050.description:
It's the gorgeously dark, moody and mysterious soundtrack of the rogue-like murder mystery game A Matter of Murder. This soundtrack includes seventeen tracks of music composed by Eric Hamel, and features the vocals of Robin JaVonne Smith (the voice of Diva LaVoix) and Eric Hamel.

1. None Shall Weep A Tear For Me (1:07)
2. A Matter of Murder - Main Theme (0:58)
3. Searching the House (2:28)
4. Suspects on Parade (1:40)
5. Modis Operandi (1:38)
6. Gathering the Evidence (1:38)
7. Mute Testimony (1:38)
8. Hunting for Clues (1:17)
9. Racing to the Answer (1:50)
10. Constable Bobby's Inquisition (1:08)
11. What Really Happened (0:48)
12. Brialliant Deduction (0:09)
13. The Killer Got Away (0:15)
14. Goodbye, Detective (0:11)
15. None Shall Weep A Tear For Me -- Extended Cut (2:52)
16. The Killer Got Away -- Alternate Cut (0:20)
17. A Matter of Murder -- Main Theme -- Alternate Cut (0:55)
676050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
